4.name: 常规公告4
4.title: Join Our Community！
4.text: Join Our Community Become part of our community. Stay up-to-date with the latest game news, share your epic catches, and swap tips with anglers from all over the world. Join our official Discord server to unlock exclusive rewards and special events! Head over to #community-events channel to claim 500 Diamonds！ Ready to cast your line? Click the button below and jump into the fun!

5.name: 常规公告5
5.title: Take the Survey and Earn 500 Diamonds!
5.text: Take the Survey & Earn 500 Diamonds Thank you for participating in the Apex Fishing Alpha Test! To further improve the game experience, we invite you to take a short survey to help us better understand your background, gaming habits, and preferences. Complete our short survey and earn 500 Diamonds ! Apex Fishing Player Survey
